p: Furthermore, Tables 2, 3 illustrate the MIC and MBC values of the methanolic and chloroformic extracts of the tested medicinal plants against bacteria, respectively. The methanolic extract of P. harmala fruits showed the maximum activity against S. aureus and E. coli with MIC = 1.56 µg mL −1. In addition, chloroformic extracts of S. flavescens and P. harmala fruit indicated maximum activity against S. aureus and P. aeruginosa with MIC = 1.56 µg mL −1, respectively.
